choices: It's his wife Diane on the phone.
It's the laboratory calling, asking about his experiment.
It's his lab assistant, Mary, calling to ask Stan a question.
1.content:
Stan Wilson was a famous scientist from the Einstein Laboratory and today was the discovery of an experiment he had been waiting to begin. After watching the movie "Fantastic Voyage," Stan got the idea that he wanted to explore the inside of a living thing. To lessen the risks, he decides to inject himself into an ordinary rabbit, but first, he must go find a rabbit first.


As he goes to leave the house, the phone rings...
1.title: The Beginning

choices: Stan gets the rabbit with success.
Stan doesn't get the rabbit and must go to the pet store.
11.content:
Stan picks up the phone to discover its his loving wife Diane.

"Hi honey, how are you?" Stan replies, as he checks his computer for rabbits from Ebay. So far, no such luck.

The two have their conversation, until Stan hears that Diane is going to be a few minutes late at her workplace, which is the bank.

"Honey, don't you worry, I'll be here when you get home," says Stan, assuring that today is going to be a good day.

After talking to his wife, Stan decides to ask his neigbor's son, Alex, if he can borrow their rabbit for his experiment.
11.title: Wife Calls.

choices: The submarine begins to shrink, with Stan inside.
The submarine shrinks just as Diane walks into the house.
111.content:
Stan leaves the house to get the rabbit for his experiment, and sure enough he gets it with success. However, little Alex tells him he would like "Buns-Buns" back before dinner time. Stan laughs and tells him the rabbit will be back in no time.

Up in the attic, Stan sets the rabbit down onto the table, then checks out the giant submarine in the corner of the attic. "This is it, for the first time a human being will be injected into an animal," Stan says out loud as he checks the outside of the submarine. As he is finishing the adjustments of the sub, Stan doesn't hear the phone ring. The answering machine picks up and its Diane. She informs that she is actually on her way home and doesn't have to work late after all.

Stan enters the sub and prepares for the sub to shrink. He plans to fly the sub into the needle, and wait for Diane to inject it into the rabbit...little does Stan realize that he didn't leave the note for her to do this task.
111.title: It's time for the Experiment.

choices: Diane's car pulls up into the driveway, not realizing Stan's small.
The next door neighbor, Mrs. Rachael, walking into the home.
1111.content:
Stan closes his eyes and places on his protective goggles inside the submarine as it begins to slowly shrink down to microscopic size. Stan watches in amazement as a small paper clip next to the sub soon becomes a giant paper clip. Stan also watches as the attic door begins to become further and further away from him.


Everything is going well that is until something happens....
1111.title: The Giant World Awaits

choices: Sit tight and hope noone finds him.
Get out and try to come up with a way to catch their attention
11111.content:
As Stan is sitting in the submarine he hears a car pulling up into the driveway outside. He wonders who it could possibly be since his wife wasn't supposed to get home until much later, but he couldn't go and investigate because he is still shrinking inside his submarine and as he watches the window is getting farther and farther away until it seems like it's a million miles away. As Stan is sitting inside the submarine waiting for it to finish shrinking he mentally goes over the list of things he was supposed to do to prepare for this experiment and as he gets to the item where he was supposed to leave a note for his wife to help him out with his experiment he gets a sinking feeling in his stomach because he forgot to do it and now he has no way of getting into the rabbit. Even if he chose to get out and walk it would take him an hour to get across the room to where the rabbit was, plus he would have no way to get inside without his submarine.

He thinks about the choices he has and gets a little depressed because they are very limited. Really about the only logical choice he can come up with is just to sit and wait for the shrinking effects to wear off and for him to return to his normal size which won't happen for another eight hours. He sighs heavily thinking about all the wasted time and money going down the drain, all because he forgot to leave a note for his wife.

As he is there contemplating all of this he hears some deep booming sounds coming towards him. He has no idea what it is or who it is that might be coming up the stairs. He needs to decide what to do.
11111.title: The forgotten Note

choices: auditory system (ears)
digestive system
111111.content:
Stan sat in his sub, floating in the syringe and waiting for his wife to arrive. Hopefully she knew to inject him into the rabbit.

Diane had entered the room and began to look around for her husband. "Stan? Honey, you in here? Hmm... he must have already shrunk. There's the syringe. Well, here goes..."

Diane picked up the syringe and pricked the needle into her own left arm, before pushing Stan's sub into her body and injecting him into her own bloodstream. Once he was in, she removed the needle and put the syringe down. "Okay, that's done. I hope he'll be okay inside me."

Meanwhile, Stan was floating through Diane's bloodstream and being buffeted along by dozens of giant red blood cells. "Diane... you were supposed to inject me into the rabbit, not you!" he yelled in anger, though he had no way of communicating with her. He checked the readouts on the sub and decided to make the best of a bad situation. "Okay, computer; plot a course for Diane's..."
111111.title: Sit tight and hope noone finds him.

choices: She has desert
She decides against it
1111112.content:
"Course set. Might as well take advantage of this mistake. An active human host is going to be much more interesting than a dormant rabbit anyway." Stan reasoned, piloting his sub along the blood vessel.

Diane was in the kitchen at this point, preparing some lunch for herself. A nice ham salad sandwich. She sat down with her lunch and began to eat, wondering where Stan was inside her and what he was doing. Could he even be in her tummy as she ate her lunch?

Indeed he was. Stan had piloted the sub into Diane's stomach and was currently watching her eat lunch from inside her belly. He felt close to her in a new way. His sub hovered above a sea of roaring green stomach acid, as huge islands of masticated sandwich mush stewed away. The fleshy walls of this impossibly gigantic cavern, twisted and churned the stomach contents. Stan watched in amazement, completely loving every second of this experience.

Diane had finished eating and sat back, rubbing her belly in satisfaction. A thought occurred to her. If Stan was in her tummy, maybe he'd want to see more than a plain old sandwich? Maybe she should have something more filling? Or desert? Her mouth watered at the thought.
1111112.title: Diane's Digestive Discretion

choices: Diane
Your assistant Mary
111112.content: Stan walks out of the submarine and stands on the table watching the door open... who is it?
111112.title: who is it???

choices: Of course
No she never payed attention
1111121.content: It's Diane! Somehow she got out of work early! She walks in and notices the submarine is gone... She does know about your experiment right???
1111121.title: Her

choices: Start flying the sub around her face.
call her on cell phone
11111212.content:
All this time when Stan told his wife about the experiment she wasn't really interested and thought it was just making the submarine, not shrinking inside of it! She realizes it's gone and and thinks Stan must've taken it to work. She walks toward the table you were on and stands near it with her hands on her hips. Confused as to why the room is empty, Diane calls out, "Honey, are you up here?" Stan looks from inside the submarine and wonders:

How does he get his wife's attention???
11111212.title: Confused.

choices: into Diane's  mouth!
Up Diane's nose!
1112.content:
The submarine begins to shrink with Stan in it. Downstairs, Diane enters the house. She takes off her coat and looks around.

"Hello?" called Diane to the seemingly empty house. There is no answer. Shrugging, Diane goes up to the attic to check something on the submarine. However, when Diane enters the attic, the submarine is gone! Diane was startled for a moment, but then realized that Stan must've already shrunk and was in the needle.

In the submarine, Stan cursed to himself. He had forgotten to tell Diane that she needed to put the shrunken submarine in the needle before injecting the rabbit. Stan was surprised to see Diane in the attic. Had she gotten off work early?
Stan gasped as Diane picked up the needle. He turned on the submarine and flew it over towards the needle. But, Diane was too fast for him and had turned towards "Buns-Buns". He gasped as he was headed straight....
1112.title: Wife Arrives Early.

choices: Diane swallows!
Diane realizes her mistake
11121.content:
"Have a nice time in this rabbit, Stan" said Diane as she injected the rabbit with the needle. Little did Diane know that the submarine that was supposed to be in the needle had flown right inside her mouth!


Diane's mouth looked exactly like a cave to Stan. Diane's teeth was like huge white stargatites and ... (can't spell those two)
Diane's tongue was like a huge red carpet with bumps all over it. These bumps were Diane's taste buds, but Stan knew that Diane couldn't taste the tiny submarine. It was also VERY moist in her mouth. Stan stopped the engines to the submarine and tried to exit Diane's mouth. But, Diane's mouth had closed, bathing the entire area into pitch-black. Stan turned on the submarine's lights. This was perfect. Instead of going into a rabbit, Stan had gone inside his wife's mouth! Stan sighed. Then he remembered. He had a two-way radio with Diane! Stan would've used it inside the rabbit's body to report his findings. Now, it was Stan's only chance to get out of Diane's mouth. Stan fumbled with the headset and turned it on.
"Diane" said Stan. "Can you---"
Suddenly...
11121.title: Into a moist cave

choices: Call Diane...
Explore her insides a little more...
111211.content:
Stan suddenly felt a bump, then, all he could see was a dark, pink tunnel, and he had an idea where it was headed. Into his wife's stomach!

Outside, Diane felt a lump in her throat and began wondering what was it. She then continues to refill the syringe with water.

Inside Diane's stomach, the sub plopped onto a soft and pink fleshy area of the stomach. Stan opened his eyes, wanting to see his condition. Turns out his wife hadn't eaten since lunch. All he saw was a tiny puddle of water. But he wasn't the least worried, since the sub was acid-proof. Stan couldn't believed it.. eaten by his own wife!

Then, Stan remembered something. He could communicate with his wife through his cell phone. He picked it up...
111211.title: Diane's stomach

choices: Too late! Stan enters the small intestine...
Diane begins to poke her stomach to see if this is all true.
1112112.content:
[Writer's Note: Sorry for the cell phone thing. I meant two-way radio. Sorry for the inconvenience!]

Stan reached for the headset, but suddenly he heard a loud growling sound. It came from somewhere near him, and that meant that his wife was hungry. "Diane, honey, you should have taken the sandwiched I offered you" Stan thought to himself. Then he remembered something. This sub came equipped with the latest microcamera, installed at the front lights.

Outside, Diana took a cup of chocolate milk, poured it in a cup, and gulped down.

Stan suddenly heard a splashing sound from above, and when he looked up, he saw brown liquid coming in from the esophagus. The milk splashed the tiny sub around, and when it stopped shaking, Stan took a look out the window. The sub is now completely floating above a lake of chocolate milk. Then, he sees a hole in his wife's stomach. It must lead to the small intestine, he thought. But before he entered his wife's gut, he switched on his camera to let her know.

Outside, Diane was startled by the monitor nearby when it suddenly blinked open. She exclaimed "Why, you must have eaten a , Bun-Bun!" when she saw the monitor displaying a gut. "Hold on..." she said, "...that looks like chocolate milk! Bunnies don't take chocolate milk! Hey, I was taking chocolate milk just now!! Oh My God...STAN!!"
1112112.title: Now showing: How drinks enter the stomach....

choices: Stan has guided the sub along Diane's bloodstream.
Somehow, Stan managed to head along a vein leading to Diane's ear.
11121122.content:
Keeping control of the sub, Stan activated the propellers and guided the sub away from the hole leading to the small intestine. Meanwhile, Diane wanted to make sure this wasn't a dream and brought her left hand down to start poking her stomach. With one poke, Diane looks at the monitor. Oddly, she can see her inner stomach wall vibrating, but the sub's not on the monitor.

Where is it?
11121122.title: Stop Poking Me!

choices: He finds the right way to the brain
He is lost in the bloodstream
111211221.content: Stan calls up Diane and tells her I am in your blood, I do not know which part I am in though. Anyway,it should not be long before I reach your heart. Diane wondered "My heart?". Stan replied yes it is the pump in your body which regulates the bloodstream. Anyway I will call when I reach it. Diane I am heading for your brain, Diane is shocked.
111211221.title: Stan has guided the sub along Diane's blood...

choices: In the tea
On something else that Diane has
1112112211.content: Stan follows the correct artery to connecting Diane's brain to her heart. He notifies Diane that he has reached her brain and is planning to exit from her nose. But before Diane can warn him of her drink after the milkshake her drink of tea. Stan is fast approaching her nose and stimulating Diane's nose for a sneeze but where does his sub land?
1112112211.title: He finds the right way to the brain

11121122112.content:
Diane was getting ready for a sneeze but she was aware that she was facing her tea and she did not want to drink her husband so she got a piece of tissue out of her pocket. She luckily sneezed it the tissue and the sub landed into the soft surface. Diane then used the shrink ray's growth function to be reunited with her husband Stan. Diane's first response to him was "I was so worried about you. *sniff sniff*"

{{i}center}The End{/center}{/i}
11121122112.title: On something else that Diane has

choices: exit Diane through her nose.  She has to sneeze.
exit Diane through a tiny cut in her ankle by the ankle strap of her heeled shoe
111212.content:
Diane suddenly realizes she made a mistake, but to Stan's dismay, its a completely different one.

"Oh wait, I forgot to put in the serum to put the rabbit to sleep," says Diane who immediately stares at the rabbit, who appears to be doing just fine anyway. In fact, the rabbit was just injected with water fluid, but Diane thought the submarine was inside it.


Seeing and hearing this, Stan realizes he has to act quickly and try to get back to the outside world.


Meanwhile, Diane has now moved from the attic into the bedroom, where she decides to slip on her new pair of black high heel shoes. She thinks that Stan is indeed home, just hiding for fun.

As for Stan, he decides to...
111212.title: A Different Mistake

choices: Diane returns to the attic
The telephone rings
1112121.content:
Stan piloted the submarine to Diane's nose. It was digusting. There was a great pool of snot behind what looked to be a dam, holding the snot back. Stan moved the submarine lower in Diane's nose and saw little hairs that kept dust out of the nose.

Meanwhile, Diane felt she had to sneeze suddenly. Quickly she ran to the box of tissues, but it was too late. She had sneezed.

When Diane had sneezed, the submarine ejected from her nose at over 100 miles an hour it felt like to Stan. Stan quickly moved the submarine before it crashed into the wall. Stan turned the submarine back towards Diane. He would wait for her to return to the attic, then Stan would move into the needle just before she gave the rabbit the serum. Stan landed the submarine on Diane's arm.
1112121.title: Sneezed out

choices: She decides to call Stan's cell phone number to see what is going on.
She calls her friend Jennifer, who is a veternarian to check the rabbit.
11121212.content:
Operator: would you like to accept a call from Dr. Stan's laboratory?

Diane accepts the call, wondering why would they call the house?

It's Dr. Madison, Stan's supervisor, obviously checking to see if the experiment went well.

Diane, not realizing that her husband has just been sneezed out, paces around, talking to Dr. Madison on the phone, saying the rabbit was injected with the needle, but no serum was in it, only water fluid.

Madison states that the rabbit needs to be injected again..but not until tomorrow.

Diane hangs up the phone and ponders what to do next.
11121212.title: Laboratory calls.

choices: tell Diane where he is, thinking she will believe him.
decides to lie, saying he is at the laboratory itself.
111212121.content:
As Stan continues to move the sub along Diane's arm, a sudden ring makes him jump. It's his cell phone going off...Diane still doesn't know her husband is shrunk. Thinking of what to do, Stan ponders if he should answer it.

What will he say? How will he explain his situation?


Stan decides to...
111212121.title: Climb the Arm.

choices: Diane reaches the lab
Stan encounters an invader
1112121212.content:
"Uh, hi honey," stated Stan in a small voice, "I'm really busy right now, can you call back at a later time cause I'm exploring some really interesting details on cellular mutation. If you need me to get the microscope ready, let me know because I'll be in Sector 46." BEEP. The ring tone was rendered off and Stan breathed a sigh of relief.
Meanwhile Diane had made her way to the receptionist desk where a nice lady with frumpy hair answered.
"I'm looking for my husband, he said he'll be in sector 43." The lady stared at her briefly before motioning to her.
"Follow me," the lady with the hair rollers stated in monotone.
1112121212.title: decides to lie, saying he is at the laboratory ...

choices: Diane turns her head but the sub still flies up her left nostril.
Diane lowers her head and the sub is in her hair.
11122.content: Heading for the nose!? No this can't be right!- Stan thinks to himself as his own's wife nose nears. But maybe something will cause Stan to miss? Stan prays as the sub gets closer to his wife's left nostril.
11122.title: Does the nose know?

choices: Diane feels something in her nose
Stan gets control of the sub
111221.content: Stan struggled to get control of the sub as it approached Diane's nose. The controls weren't responding, but Diane started to move her head. Stan sighed with relief as his wife's head turned, but before long he realized that she hadn't moved enough. The sub was still drawing nearer to Diane's left nostril. Stan once again struggled for control, but his efforts were in vain. A moment later, the sub entered Diane's nose. Even inside, it continued to rise, flying through the forest of hair that filled the nostril. By this point, Stan gave up trying to control the sub, since it was too late anyway. He simply let his vehicle fly on its own, heading deeper and deeper into his wife's nose. Eventually, the sub hit a particularly dense clump of nose hair and stopped, as if caught in a net.
111221.title: A nose for adventure

choices: Stan gets the sub out of the mucous
Stan sees flu viruses being sucked into Diane's nose
1112212.content: Suddenly, Stan managed to get control of the sub. He got the sub out of the net of nose hair and began to pilot the sub down towards the exit of Diane's nostril. Suddenly, Diane felt something inside her nose and sniffed, sucking Stan deeper into her nose toward her sinuses. Stan hit the wall of his wife's nasal cavity and got stuck in the mucous covering the wall. The sticky mucous trapped the sub, and Stan was unable to get out.
1112212.title: Stan gets control of the sub

choices: Diane sneezes
Diane sniffs again
11122121.content: Stan thought for a moment, trying to come up with a way to break free of the mucous. Nothing he thought of seemed like a particularly great idea, but he knew he would have to try something if he didn't want to be stuck there forever. Stan began to ease the sub back and forth, making it slowly but steadily wobble around in the mucous. The mucous began to stretch, and Stan saw that by some stroke of luck, his plan was actually working. He increased the sub's speed, making it wobble faster, and much to his delight, the sub broke free. It shot forward into Diane's dense nose hair, and while it didn't get stuck again, Diane definitely felt a tickle in her nose.
11122121.title: Attempted escape

choices: Diane blows her nose.
Diane suddenly has to sneeze again.
111221211.content:
As the submarine and Stan plowed the dense nose hair in his wife's nose outside Diane felt a powerful tickle shooting up her nostril,unfortunately for Stan his plan had freed the sub but judging from the surroundings it was definitely at a cost. Outside the sub Stan could see the tunnel of mucus and flesh wiggle and twitch around the sub, outside Diane held her finger under her rapidly twitching nose, Desperately searching for a tissue, knowing she couldn't hold the coming explosion back long. Just as she noticed a nearby tissue box she lost control as Stan's sub rubbed up against the side of her nostril, her eyes glazed and her hand dropping from under her nostrils, as she approached the tissue box her breath began to hitch with each step as she got closer.

"ah..."

she took another step as the tickle in her nose grew.

"AAah... Haaah..."

just as she was about to reach the tissue box she let out rather loud "HAH-TSHIEW!"

Meanwhile inside Diane's nose Stan held on tight as the sub was blasted out of it's original position and careened through his Wife's nasal passage, the sub being knocked around quite a bit but seeming not to take any damage, after the sub seemed to have stopped flying through the nostril Stan stood up and looked around seeing the room his wife had wandered to. Stan was about to breath a sigh of relief when he looked down and saw he was still far above the air and the sub's engines had stalled as he looked around more he slowly looked up and saw the cavernous nostril of his wife above him along with a long strand of mucus dripping from her nose(likely loosened from his previous plan) he also noticed the sub was rather messily slimy as well outside. below he saw the lips of his wife begin to speak.

"My that was a big one..." she looked at a nearby mirror and grimaced at the strand of mucus her sneeze had dislodged and grabs a tissue from the box.
111221211.title: Diane sneezes

choices: into her throat!
into her lungs!
111221212.content: The sub had hit Diane's nose hair again as it broke free, causing Diane to feel a tickle in her nose. She sniffed again, and didn't think much of it, completely unaware that she had just sucked her husband deeper into her head. Inside her nose, a sudden flow of air had sucked the sub deeper into the cavern's of Diane's nose. The sub was not powerful enough to escape the powerful sniff. Stan watched in horror as the sub flew helplessly through Diane's nose, further away from her nostrils, the only source of light in her nose, and...
111221212.title: Diane sniffs again

choices: Stan sticks with the original plan and buys the rabbit.
Stan changes his mind and heads back home.
112.content:
No rabbit...great, that means Stan has no choice but to drive to the pet store and buy one. Fine.


So Stan, saying under his breath that he doesn't have time for this, gets into his car and goes in search of an ordinary rabbit for his experiment. On the way, Stan wonders what it will be like once he is injected into the rabbit.


As Stan arrives at the pet store's parking lot, he gets to thinking...what if I get injected into something else? Maybe an ordinary mouse or what about a housefly!

Stan ponders what to do...
112.title: A Delay

choices: Stan chooses old Mrs. Anderson, who lives across the street.
Stan chooses his lab assignment, thinking that's the safest choice.
1122.content:
Stan realizes that he cannot keep putting this experiment off. The instructions say that the needle is going to be place into the rabbit and then be pushed so that the microscopic submarine in the serum will go into the rabbit, exploring the inside.


Well, Stan reads the instructions closely. He wonders: what if the laboratory allows him to be injected into a human being instead? That way, more research can be made.

Besides...the inside of a rabbit is less important than the insides of a human being, according to Stan's own theory.

So, having said that, Stan wonders who he should be injected into...it can't be his wife because she is still not home from work.
1122.title: Back at Home.

choices: Kaylee's small intestines.
Go straight to the lungs.
11222.content: Kaylee Lopez, Stan's 21 year old lab assistant, she's Latin and really smart and always wanted to help Stan with his lab assignments. Stan and Kaylee talk about the experiment, Stan choose not to be injected into a rabbit but choose to go inside the human body instead. Kaylee agree with him and shockingly telling him to go inside her body, Stan looks surprised but agree her. Stan get in the submarine with Kaylee at the controls shrinks him into a needle, Stan see Kaylee walk up and picks up the needle and says to microscopic Stan through the headsets are you ready Stan, he says yes Kaylee. Kaylee injects the submarine into her arm, Stan rushed straight through her bloodstream he turn on the navigation system of Kaylee's body, he says through his headset Kaylee can you hear me, she's yes I can, Kaylee put up a map of her body and sees Stan's location and he heading to the stomach. Stan arrives to the stomach and notice alot of chewed up chips and fruit. Stan says this girl must really love chips because she eats alot of them, he must be careful with the sub, the stomach acid are very closer to it. Stan is amazed that he's inside an actual human body, inside a young latina girl's body at that. Stan's fantastic journey inside the human body has only just begun.
11222.title: Kaylee's body.

choices: Diane decides to call Stan to check on him.
Stan realizes he doesn't have the rabbit  for his experiment.
12.content:
Before Stan can begin, the phone rings. When Stan answers, he realizes its his laboratory boss, Dr. Harris, asking about the experiment in which Stan is about to perform.

Dr. Harris says, "Dr. Wilson, hi this is your boss calling." "I was just wondering if you are working on your experiment you told us at yesterday's meeting."

Stan replies, "Don't worry sir, I have got everything under control. In fact, when I'm done, I'll send the full report next Monday."

Stan hangs up and checks the final preparations on the submarine.

Meanwhile...
12.title: Laboratory Calls.

choices: Diane goes home to check on her husband.
Diane calls her friend Jennifer to go to the house and check on Stan.
121.content:
Diane, working hard at the bank, decides it would be nice to check on her husband. As she dials the number, she doesn't realize that at the same time, Stan is climbing into the submarine, activating the controls, and is currently shrinking down to microscopic size. It's as if time is clicking at the same moment because as soon as Diane sets the phone's receiver against her left ear, the submarine vanishes from viewing sight; it is now microscopic size.

"That's odd, no one is answering," Diane asks out loud. She assumes Stan is busy working on the experiment, but just to make sure, she decides on one of 2 things:
121.title: No one answers the phone...

choices: Diane comes home
A  female lab worker comes and checks  with Stan's experiment
122.content:
After Stan finishes checking the submarine, he realizes he doesn't have a rabbit to do his experiment! But where to find a rabbit? At the pet store at the mall or next door? Stan decided that Susan's pet rabbit would do. He didn't have any monety to go to a pet shop anyway. So, Stan left his house to borrow Susan's pet rabbit.


Meanwhile....
122.title: Rabbit needed

choices: Stan still thinks that he should be injected into Diane's body. (Bloodstream.)
Stan lets Diane swallow the submarine. (Digestive system.)
Stan flies the submarine up Diane's nose. (Respiratory system.)
1221.content: Stan was originally going to go over to his neighbor's house to borrow their pet rabbit for his experiment, but just as he was about to leave, he noticed that his wife Diane had just pulled into the driveway. This was perfect timing on Diane's part, since in her husband's mind, he thought that now he wouldn't have to go get the neighbor's rabbit. When Diane came inside, the couple of course greeted each other like all romanticized couples do, with affectionate nicknames and a peck on the cheek. However, little while after Diane got home, Stan decided to ask her a few questions... "Hey, honey?" said Stan to his wife. "I need to ask you about something regarding my experiment." After hearing this Diane was surprised that her husband was bringing this up with her, considering the fact that she knew practically nothing about it other than that Stan came up with the idea for it after they watched Fantastic Voyage together that one time. Diane, not wanting to seem ignorant said "Actually, I was going to ask how your experiment was coming along sweetie. Anyways go on." "Well to answer your question Diane, my experiment was going smoothly, but I've recently met a roadblock." "What's preventing you from continuing your experiment?" "I haven't recieved the rabbit that I'm supposed to use as a test subject yet, and well, that ties into what I want to ask..." Diane gave Stan a confused looking glqnce for a few seconds before putting two-and-two together. "Wait, you want to use me as your test subject?" "Precisely honey. However, judging from your reaction, I'm going to assume you don't know much about it, do you?" Diane begrudingly said yes to her husbands question, and in response to this Stan sighed brought Diane upstairs to the attic, where he had been keeping the submarine. "Okay Diane here's the plan, here's the submarine that I will pilot while I'm inside of your body, once I get inside the submarine it will start to shrink afterwhich I will fly it into that syringe, which I want you to inject into your arm once I'm inside of it, did you understand all of that?" "Yes Stan, I understood what you said." "Do you have sny questions before we start?" "I have one actually." "Well, what is it?" "You said that the submarine can fly, right?" "Yes." "Well, if it can fly then why does it need to be injected into my body when it would be easier for you to either let me swallow it or pilot the thing up my nose?" Stan wasn't prepared for a question like that,iIt might actually make him reconsider his plan for his own fantastic voyage into his wife. Does it?
1221.title: Diane the rabbit replacement.

choices: put the rabbit on the table to begin the experiment.
order Chinese so that Diane doesn't have to cook when she gets home.
13.content:
It's Mary calling Stan to ask a question...of course she has been asking questions since being hired last Friday.

"Sir, do u have the files for the turtle experiment at the lab everyone worked on yesterday?"

Stan smiles and tells Mary that everything is going to be fine. Without hesitation, he hangs up the phone and returns to the experiment.


Stan thus decides to...
13.title: Phone Call from Mary

choices: A red button near the submarine
Stan who was scribbling things into his notepad whilst talking (Insta-shrink)
The new female assistant who just arrived
132.content: "Spring rolls, nasi goreng and chicken feet, uhuh, and some for my lovely wife." Stan stated over the phone as meanwhile, the turtle experiment arrived and the poor scientist was waaaay too distracted to notice the flying turtle bumping all over the place. It was a hybrid and flapped nonlachalantly all over the place with its fin flippers. Then it bumped into
132.title: Stan with an order of...

info.brief_description: Fantasic Voyage in the year 2005. Man has adventure and shrinks.  Please add, keep clean
info.description:
For those of us who remember the famous movie "Fantasic Voyage" will recall that a microscopic flying submarine with a group of scientists inside was injected into a man's body to remove a virus inside his brain. But now it is the year 2005, and a man named Stan Wilson, with his loving wife Diane, has decided to bring that moment back. Only this time, he decides to lessen the risk by being injected into a rabbit. During the shrinking process, something goes horribly wrong when the flying submarine shrinks even before being placed into the needle.

Please add to this story, and keep it Clean! no toilet stuff, gay stuff, etc.

Rate too please. Enjoy!
